returns all polygons that touch the bounding volume specified.

public methods

check to see if the box passed in fits inside of the bounds.

if we're not a leaf, then we need to check children.

recurse to children.

if we're a leaf and we intersect with the bounds passed in, then we should add our polygon to the list.
